segments.text: Are you going to the party on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about it . Are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I heard it's going to be a lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Well , what time does it start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , who all is going to be there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you know it's going to be so fun ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This party is going to have a DJ , food , and drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that does sound like it's going to be fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So am I going to see you at the party ?
segments.speaker: S1
